pageProps.content:
Experience

Taita Falcon Lodge is set above the mighty Zambezi River, overlooking its winding waters & the dramatic cliffs of the Batoka Gorge.
This Zambian wilderness retreat is all about the views! With its vast viewing platform, it is the perfect place to sit & take in Zambia’s scenic vistas.
This area boasts a variety of trails where guests can explore the gorge & the indigenous forests.

Stay

Taita Falcon Lodge has 7 stylish en-suite chalets, each featuring its own secluded garden, outdoor shower & indoor lounge.
All the chalets have been designed using local materials such as stones form the gorge & reeds from the fiver.
The main area includes a bar, pool & boma area.

Activities

A wide range of activities are available to guests visiting Victoria Falls.
Some of these include microlight flights over the Falls, white water river rafting or canoeing on the mighty Zambezi River, swimming at Devil’s Pool, lunch at Livingstone island, sunset boat cruises, bungee jumping & much more!

subfolders.title: David Livingstone Lodge
subfolders.description: David Livingstone Lodge & Spa is centrally located only 5km from the town of Livingstone in Zambia & offers a unique location with breathtaking views. As the name suggests, the majestic waterfall was discovered by the famous explorer, Dr David Livingstone in 1855 & is a must-see for guests visiting Zambia. David Livingstone Lodge consists of 72 standard rooms (of which 3 rooms are inter-leading) & 5 suites.

subfolders.title: Royal Chundu
subfolders.description: Zambia’s family-owned & run Royal Chundu is set on a private stretch of riverbank on the the Zambezi River, just upstream of the iconic Victoria Falls. Royal Chundu consists of 2 lodges – River Lodge & Island Lodge, & as the name suggests, both properties are fit for royalty.  Ideal for honeymooners, couples or families, Royal Chundu is all about exceeding expectations. The lodge is only a 40-minute drive from the Falls, making it the ideal base to explore this world wonder.

subfolders.title: Sanctuary Sussi & Chuma
subfolders.description: Sanctuary Sussi & Chuma is a tree-fort safari lodge set on a dramatic bend of the Zambezi River within the game-packed Mosi-Oa-Tunya Park, upstream from the legendary Victoria Falls. Named after Dr David Livingstone’s knowledgeable & local guides, Sussi & Chuma is a laid-back, family-friendly lodge where guests can enjoy the park’s peace & tranquility, while still being close enough to the action-packed Victoria Falls with all its fun-filled activities. Surrounded by large ebony & jackalberry trees, Sussi & Chuma comprises 12 elegant tree-house suites connected by wooden walkways.  From here awe-inspiring views over the hippo-filled river can be observed.

subfolders.title: Sindabezi Island Lodge
subfolders.description: Sindabezi Island Lodge is an exclusive camp offering luxurious island accommodation just upstream from the majestic Victoria Falls on the Zambian side. A romantic hideaway with only 5 chalets & extraordinary river views, Sindabezi mixes romance with exclusivity & offers a range of fantastic fully inclusive activities.   This accredited eco-lodge is miles away from any tourist bustle, offering a tranquil & remote safari haven.

subfolders.title: Taita Falcon Lodge
subfolders.description: Taita Falcon Lodge is set above the mighty Zambezi River, overlooking its winding waters & the dramatic cliffs of the Batoka Gorge.   This Zambian wilderness retreat is all about the views!  With its vast viewing platform, it is the perfect place to sit & take in Zambia’s scenic vistas.  This area boasts a variety of trails where guests can explore the gorge & the indigenous forests.

subfolders.title: The Royal Livingstone
subfolders.description: The Royal Livingstone, like the name suggests, is a 5-star hotel situated on the banks of the Zambezi River in Zambia, within walking distance to The Falls. This charming hotel offers the discerning traveler an elegant & refined colonial ambience with world class service & countless activities. The Royal Livingstone is the closest hotel to The Falls on the Zambian side & therefore guests can see the waterfall’s spray from the hotel veranda.  The edge of The Falls can be seen from the sun deck & there is direct access to the world wonder from the hotel grounds.

subfolders.title: Thorntree River Lodge
subfolders.description: Thorntree River Lodge, one of Zambia’s most contemporary lodges boasts a spectacular setting on the legendary Zambezi River, just upstream from Zambia’s biggest drawcard:  the mighty Victoria Falls. Thorntree has an eco-concious design that incorporates nature & 21-century living.   With a superb location, guests have easy access to the Falls & all the fun-filled activities it has to offer, while allowing peace & tranquility in a pristine riverfront setting.

subfolders.title: Toka Leya
subfolders.description: Toka Leya is a secluded luxury tented camp located 12km upstream from Victoria Falls & enjoys a beautiful location on the banks of the Zambezi River in Zambia. Set within the Mosi-oa-Tunya National Park, this unique tented camp is the ideal place to stay for those wishing to enjoy magnificent scenery, river views & plenty of activities – while being close enough to experience the majestic Victoria Falls. Toka Leya consists of 9 safari-style tents as well as 3 family tents, all inter-connected by a web of wooden walkways.

subfolders.title: Tongabezi Lodge
subfolders.description: Tongabezi Lodge in Zambia is set on the banks of the mighty Zambezi River & offers secluded & luxurious accommodation just upstream from the majestic Victoria Falls. A romantic hideaway with extraordinary river views, Tongabezi mixes romance with exclusivity & is the ideal destination for the discerning traveler looking for romance, tranquility & beautiful scenery.   The lodge is far from the hustle & bustle, but close enough to the thundering Victoria Falls in Livingstone with its action-packed activities.

whatWeLoveItems: Beautiful Zambezi River & Batoka Gorge cliffs
